page.title: 13SHERIFFHALES AREA-TRANSPORT
page.content: There is hardly any transport in this area apart from private cars, motor cycles and bicycles. There are no public bus routes although a school bus collects children to take them to Newport schools during term time. There is one secondary road in our area called Lillyhurst/Abbey Road. The main Wellington-Newport road - A518 cuts across the S.W. corner. There used to be a canal that ran through the area and tub boats used to carry coal along it from Donnington to Lilleshall. The canal closed in 1882.
